1592350.name: Destroy Geometric Shapes Soundtrack
1592350.description:
Soundtrack with instrumental music created especially for the game Destroy Geometric Shapes.

Now you can enjoy the themes created by the talented musician Daniel Geber on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or just relaxing. Each track can be repeated continuously. Listen directly from your Steam client.

- Includes an original soundtrack for the game Destroy Geometric Shapes.

The soundtrack can be purchased independently of the games and will also be offered in a special package with the game.
